title: CP01 - Actions: Combined
code:
<gds-flex padding="2xl" margin="auto" min-height="280px" align-items="center" justify-content="center">
  <gds-card-pattern-01 title="Multiple actions"
    excerpt="Card with two interactive buttons for primary and secondary actions">
    <gds-button slot="footer">Primary</gds-button>
    <gds-link href="#" slot="footer" size="medium">
      <gds-icon-chain-link slot="lead"></gds-icon-chain-link>
      Link text
    </gds-link>
  </gds-card-pattern-01>
</gds-flex>
